name: OCKStyler
desc: A protocol that defines styling constants.

items.name: var animation: OCKAnimationStyler
items.desc: A configurator that defines constants for values you use in animations.

items.name: var appearance: OCKAppearanceStyler
items.desc: A configurator that defines constants for view appearance styling.

items.name: var color: OCKColorStyler
items.desc: A configurator that defines color constants and default values for color constants.

items.name: var dimension: OCKDimensionStyler
items.desc: A configurator that defines constants for view sizes.
